title: #237 - Dave Attell, Tom Segura, & ME
description:
Comedians Dave Attell & Tom Segura join me in the Mancave to talk about joke writers, Doug Stanhope, internet sensations, alternative comedians, booze, his album Skanks for the Memories, & how Political Correctness is ruining comedy.

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron to get THREE FREE MEALS w/ Free Shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast
